quote: Wise men don't need advice. Fools won't take it
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The power of accurate observation is frequently called cynicism by those who don't have it
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It's not enough to know how to ride - one must know how to fall.
author: Mexican Proverb

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others, whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To you I'm an atheist; to God, I'm a Loyal Opposition
author: Woody Allen

quote: No problem is too small or too trivial if we really do something about it.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: You never know what is enough until you know what is too much.
author: William Blake

quote: Millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
author: Susan Ertz
